ovdesc.p: This application is for executing the checks for a set of orders that are part of an order session.
The orders could be a combination of buy/sell orders, derivatives orders, etc.

Based on the market values received including the impact of pending/new orders that are part of an order session, T24 will calculate the margin value of the portfolio and update the details in respective fields
